page.title: 07SHOOTING
page.content: { Bradley}and{Dunley}woods are situated within Dunley estate which covers an area of 5,000 acres.It is shot over by international business men who lease the shooting from the owners.Tenant farmers are invited to shoot at the end of the season. The{Sporting Manager}is responsible for the arrangements and the estate employs three{gamekeepers}who also act as{country wardens.}Shooting takes place every week during the season, {partridge}from October and{pheasant in November until February.All the gamekeepers accompany the guns and 20/25 beaters are employed locally; there are also 3/5 pickers up with dogs.The gamekeepers and guns use their own dogs.
